message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a rare and valuable item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $25000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $18000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest in the product, Bob! I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $22000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still not sure if I'm comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $19500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about we meet at $21000?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we meet at $20000?
I can see you're really trying to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $20000, but I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet at $20500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. How about we meet at $19500?
